---
title: "Kinase Inhibitor Prediction Overview"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: word_document
params:
  predictions: NA
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

prediction_set = params$predictions
prediction_set = temp
```

```{r}
summary_results = prediction_set %>%
	group_by(concentration_M) %>%
	summarise(mean_via = mean(predicted_viability))

ggplot(summary_results, aes(x=log10(concentration_M),y=mean_via)) +
	geom_line() +
	geom_point()
```
